transcript:
Customer: Hello, sir main bhi hello Tausif ji.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Customer: Sir main meeting mein hun call back karta hun aapko free hoke, theek hai?
Executive: Kitni der mein kar lun aapko sir?
Customer: Kal kar, kal kar lo aap kal.
Executive: Sir sir aaj iska final karna hai sir jo bhi aapka agar reactivation karwana hai to karwa deta hun sir ab jo bhi hai resolution kya karna hai mujhe sir kyunki resolution mein kya aap kya sir solution mein kya doge resolution mein kya doge?
Customer: Vahi vahi vahi main isiliye to keh raha tha thoda sa aap 5 minute discuss karna padega sir jab bhi aap.
Executive: Nahi bolo to jaldi bolo jaldi bolo bol do bol do aap fatafat.
Customer: Vahi vahi keh raha hun aap bataiye kya chahte ho sir dekhiye kyunki notification ka sir aapne aapko bataya bylead ka bhi abhi main dekh raha tha sir aapke transaction history to bylead jo aap consume kar rahe ho sir abhi last bhi jo aapne dono bylead consume kari sir vo bhi sab aapki category ki thi website development services ki thi usse pehle bhi aapne 18 November ko teen kari ek online shopping website ki thi aur ek aur kari thi sir aapne vo bhi online shopping system ki thi to bylead to sir aapki category ki generate ho rahi hai sir tabhi to aap kar rahe ho sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Varna phir kahan karte aap hi batao.
Customer: Aur abhi relevant leads mein bhi dikh raha hai sir sari cheeze leads bhi dikh rahi hai consume leads bhi dikh rahi hai jo past leads hain jo expire ho gayi hain vo bhi idhar dikh rahi hain but jis category ki bhi thoda sa limited requirement hi hai sir to usme hum fake leads to generate nahi kar sakte hain na sir ki hum fake leads generate karke aapko de de sir ab MLM ki requirement hi sir kam hai bahut matlab jitni bhi hai hum aapke show karte hain kuch leads aap consume karte hain directly approach bhi karwa dete hain hum buyer se aapko listing aapki improve ho hi gayi hai to ab isse zyada sir aap bataiye hum kya karein.
Customer: Listing listing improve hai kya listing mein matlab ki hai kya matlab ki thik thak lag raha hai kya aapko?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Listing kya bolte hain na aap log jo ek minute ruko IndiaMART acha ruk jao ek minute sir aapka kya naam IndiaMART na hmm hmm I N D I A ek minute ek kam karta hun sir line pe ruke raho main check kar leta hun. 
Executive: Uh okay.
Customer: Nahi actually kya hai na Tausif beech mein na bahut aisa profile ho gaya tha kafi acha kam aa raha tha mere ko.
Executive: Thik hai beech mein.
Customer: To aap starting starting mein jab humne raise ticket kiye the na uske baad to kam mere ko aisa laga humne kabhi koi dikkat kiya nahi ticket bola nahi lekin beech mein sab kuch sab kuch sahi thabi mamla zara kharab ho gaya na.
Executive: Sir aap sam ek cheez ko samjho sir aap kisi nayi cheez ke liye opt karte ho aapne jab MDC bhi liya hoga starting mein thoda sa time laga hoga aapka pattern set hone mein aapki cheeze aligned hone mein lekin once vo cheeze set ho jati hain sir to aapko ek acha business milta hai.
Customer: Ek minute main product pe jata hun.
Executive: Sir first page pe bataiye aapki company ka naam aa raha hai all over India base pe.
Customer: Aap dalo Google pe daliye bas MLM software daliye na sir multi level marketing software supplier daliye sir bas aap software MLM software development sir multi level marketing software supplier daliye bas aap aur search kar dijiye IndiaMART ka jo link aa raha hai us pe click kijiye pehle page pe aapki company ka naam show kar raha hai sir.
Customer: Kya kya likhun IndiaMART bataiye aap.
Executive: Aap Google pe likhiye.
Customer: Multi level marketing software supplier.
Customer: Multi level marketing software ha software supplier.
Customer: Software S U double P L I E R supplier ha.
Customer: Nahi ji ispe MLM software kuch dusri company aa rahi hai IndiaMART to aaya IndiaMART IndiaMART hi nahi aaya IndiaMART abhi chalo aaya IndiaMART.
Executive: Arey IndiaMART pe click kijiye.
Customer: Ha IndiaMART pe click kar diya to yahan pe aa raha hai koi Gurugram ki koi company hai code track.
Executive: Code tracks hai phir uske baad PRT multi software hai phir aapki Prakash IT solution hai phir Cyrus technologies hai grow moon hai sir phir Swabkit IT services hai TYMK Swastik global hai bright code hai DM marketing hai Sandhya quick web hai before exam hai people global solution hai life infotech hai web digital mantra hai.
Customer: Apna kidhar hai apna kidhar aaya apna to aaya nahi aap to bole top pe aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir vahi pehle hi page pe main bata to raha hun sir pehle hi page pe aapka aa raha hai dekhiye E store solution Ajmer 17000 per piece wala aapka sir multi level ye kya sir founder co technology private limited Lucknow ki company hai uske just neeche wali company dikh rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Lucknow life infotech hai thik hai.
Executive: Founder code technology.
Customer: Founder founder founder.
Customer: Founder to kuch dikh nahi raha hai mere ko founder.
Executive: Founder code ke just neeche hai sir founder code uske upar hai sir health stand solution private limited Campbell solution Patna se hai sir incredible India textile Gautam.
Customer: Founder ke baad solution founder ke baad solution kahan hai?
Executive: Ji ji bahut neeche ha neeche to diya hai bahut hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir neeche kya hai aap ye sab TrustSeal wale hain sir aap isme bas aap apna consumption rakhiye isme rotate karta rehta hai per click pe per click pe aapka naam upar aata hai aisa nahi hai ki aapki listing vahi ho gayi jitne bhi TrustSeal wale hain ye sabke sath aapki listing hai.
Customer: Mujhe mujhe mujhe ek baat ye samajh mein nahi aa raha hai aap thoda sa mujhe guide karo ki mujhe aisa kyun lag raha hai na ki ek minute dekho abhi na main jata hun kisi category pe aap kisi product ko dekhoge na product ko us product pe hamara jo category hai na vo sahi hai kya mujhe sahi nahi category thoda sahi nahi lag raha hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir category mapping to har ek matlab aapne itni time ticket raise kiya hai har ek ticket close karte time hum sabse primarily cheez yahi check karte hain ki aapke product ki mapping sahi hai ki nahi hai kyunki product ki agar mapping sahi nahi rehti hai sir to kahin na kahin aapko leads nahi milti hain dhang se aur yahan pe main aapko bataun to aapke har ek product mein primary aur secondary mapping humne karwai hui hai to product mapping mein sir aapko koi isme issue hi nahi dikh raha hai even agar aap chahe to.
Customer: Main main main.
Customer: Ek minute ye multi level marketing mein ye karta hun thik hai ye multi level marketing ho gaya group mein thik hai software solution services ye galat hai ye aap na grouping ka kam na please na koi agar is tarah se karwa de to mat karwaya karo vo mere ko karne diya karo aap.
Executive: Thik hai vo main aapko bata dunga grouping ka kam main matlab mana kar dunga.
Customer: Nahi grouping ka kam matlab mana grouping ka kam dekho sir abhi na main abhi check kar raha hun main mujhe kal se doubt ho raha hai grouping ka jo kam hua hai galat hua hai aur abhi main check isiliye pehle check kar raha tha grouping ka kam hi galat hua hai bilkul galat hua hai.
Customer: Aap bolo grouping mein kam na grouping bilkul galat hai grouping galat kar diya gaya hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aap jo mein koi beti na Komal unse to mat kam karaya karo yaar please.
Executive: Account handle unko idea nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi unko idea nahi hai kam ka please.
Executive: Nahi to unka account aapka assign karwa dun kisi aur ko dilwa dun.
Customer: Arey kisi ko nahi unke paas hi rehne do mujhe koi vo nahi hai lekin hum jo kam hum bolenge bas vahi kam karein vo.
Executive: Vo vahi karegi sir aap bilkul aap aap humse baat kiya kijiye na sir seedhe aap sir seedhe ticketing khol dete hain aap mujhse kahiye jo kam aapko karwana hai.
Customer: Arey madam ko to maine madam ko to bol rakha tha madam ne kuch response kiya nahi ab aap.
Executive: Maine sir aapke liye maine aapke liye sir even dusre department ki ek ladki hai Manju usse tak aapko video meeting karwai aapne kaha sir isse discuss karke jo bhi inka resolution hai jo bhi problem aa rahi hai inko resolve karo I think usne bhi aapse video meeting kari hogi sir vo dusre department ki hain tab bhi sir.
Customer: Hmm samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Customer: Yaar.
Customer: Chalo change to kar diya hai let's see dekhte hain.
Executive: Ji sir baki thoda patience rakhiye Sahil sir aayega response aayega sir aap start kiya hai.
Customer: Abhi change kiya hai let's see dekhte hain.
Executive: Ha vahi keh raha hun sir start kiya hai aapne response milega sir aap jab MDC bhi mil raha tha to sir isme to definitely milega main us time bhi yahi keh raha tha aur abhi bhi yahi kahunga sir.
Customer: Chalo abhi maine abhi maine kuch change kiya hai ab isko thoda apne apne base pe thoda sa ab isko check karta hun daily actually aap log ka jo checking hai na thoda sa mujhe laga na ki vo setting thoda gadbad ho gaya product ka ab daily kya hai na do char product main daily add karunga usko chalo thik hai ek do mahine tak aap logo ko koi koi message koi ticket raise nahi karunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir koi kyun nahi sir aap kijiye sir aap hame sir aapke number hai ek group hai humne create kiya hai aapke paas aap us whatsapp group pe ek message daliye hum khud aapko contact karenge chahe Komal ho chahe main hun priority pe contact karenge sir ek whatsapp group bhi create karwa diya tha isiliye sir ki koi bhi problem ho sir ek group mein ek message dal dijiye hum turant connect kar len sir to aapko koi problem ho turant aap group pe message daliye sir hum log yahi kam sir servicing department hi hai sir hum logon ka koi aisa nahi hai sir ki aap sales kar diya aapko uske baad se bhul gaye main pure saal aapka jo account hai meri team mein rahega sir.
Customer: Koi nahi koi nahi chalo thik hai thik hai aap ticket close kar lo chalo aapko teen mahine baad yaad karunga main.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisi main Sahil sir main aapse ye bhi hamara to kam hai sir aapse feedback lena aapse Komal ko har 15 20 din pe ek bar connect karke feedback lena hoga sir to aapko aur koi bhi issue ho sir nahi main connect kar lunga sir dekho aapko koi bhi issue na aapke paas mera number hai sir dono number hai aap whatsapp pe group mein added hun main aap ek message bas dal dijiye Tausif ji connect me main priority pe turant aapko call kar lunga sir.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi chalo thik hai thik hai thik hai aapko teen mahine wait karta hun main.
Executive: Ji aur baki sir ek chota sa feedback jayega sir vo mere liye sir de dijiyega satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Ha verified kar dunga teen mahine tak aapko yaad hi nahi karne wala hun aap log ko teen mahine baad hi teen mahine baad yaad karunga to nahi nahi teen mahine baad hi yaad karunga sir teen mahine baad to phir matlab jitne din ka service use bhi karunga to vo bhi vo bhi hum dekh lenge koi dikkat nahi hai chalo teen mahine baad.
Executive: Aap aap teen mahine nahi sir aap daily yaad kijiye hum vo nahi keh rahe hain.
Customer: Arey aap log aap log bolte hain na ki sir kitna aap ticket raise karte hain bhai jo paisa diya hai usko bhi usko bhi dhandha vo bhi vo bhi sun to lo vo bhi hamari pay di ja rahi hai to usko bhi dhandha aayega tabhi to ye pay karega na vo aisa to nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul karega sir nahi sir lekin aap hame directly call kijiye na sir aap dekho aap ticket bhi raise karte ho to kisse baat hoti hai humse hi to baat hoti hai sir humse baat hui Komal se baat hui aisa to nahi hai sir kisi aur se baat hoti hai.
Customer: Sir priority pe call aati hai na phir Tausif se ye bhi to hai na.
Executive: To aap sir ek bar whatsapp group pe bhi message karke dekho sir aapke paas priority pe call aayegi sir main attach.
Customer: Chalo thik hai thik hai thik hai thik hai sir abhi abhi main aapko call hi nahi karne wala hun teen mahine tak aap teen mahine tak enjoy karo mere se aap tension free raho thik hai.
Executive: Arey nahi sir kyun kyun tension free sir hamara to sir kam hai servicing department ka hum to sir aapko feedback ke liye bhi call karenge.
Customer: Teen mahine tak teen mahine tak to main kuch bolne wala nahi hun teen mahine baad hi milenge aapse dekhte hain kya aap log kam karte ho dekhte hain kabhi call aata hai kya aap logon ka.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai chalo thik hai thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Listing is not appearing on the first page.

- Dissatisfied with the grouping of products.

- Category mapping issue.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the listing and confirmed it is visible.

- Executive assured to resolve the grouping issue.

- Executive assured to resolve category mapping issue.

- Executive informed about the WhatsApp group for quick assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check after 3 months.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, category, grouping, whatsapp group, mdc
